name: RelianceCM
overview:
Formally Mega Tech of Oregon, RelianceCM specializes in contract manufacturing for startups, emerging businesses and pioneering OEMs.

RelianceCM provides complete engineering, manufacturing and fulfillment solutions tailored to the demands of the high tech, consumer product, transportation, medical, industrial product and cleantech industries.

Comprised of engineers, academics, thought leaders and entrepreneurial spirits, our combined skill set is as diverse as our clientele. We’re inspired by innovators, excited by challenge, and ready to take your product to market with the ease and efficiency that comes with over 25 years experience.

Engineering: RelianceCM can work independently or collaborating with external engineers to design products poised for success today and tomorrow. We anticipate possible manufacturing, procurement and delivery issues to provide your products with the highest chance of long-term success.

Production: From low to high volume projects, RelianceCM’s assembly, testing and inventory management is highly scalable. Our assembly structure can be easily adapted to meet requirements in both prototyping and production, resulting in custom support for evolving product changes.

Support: Supplier negotiations go beyond unit price to include custom delivery schedules and payment terms, often resulting in significant cost savings. RelianceCM can pinpoint long lead-times or obsolete parts and quickly suggest possible alternatives. Constant collaborations keep our efforts streamlined and projects on track.

milestones.description: Mega Tech of Oregon rebrands to RelianceCM
milestones.source_description: Corvallis-based Mega Tech takes a new name: RelianceCM

milestones.description: RelianceCM listed as mid-valley businesses to watch by Gazette Times.

external_links.title: Corvallis-based Mega Tech takes a new name: RelianceCM
